publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8120.1 Michael McMahon: Local Services—As an amendment to motion (S3M-8120) in the name of Robert Brown, leave out from "is concerned" to end and insert "believes that the case for reform and innovation in Scotland’s public services is unanswerable and that meeting the needs of the public is more important than preserving structures; recognises that the need to protect frontline services in the face of UK Government cuts requires the status quo in public services to be reassessed; believes that moving to a single fire and rescue service, a single police service and the creation of a national care service offers the best opportunity for improving delivery of these services in Scotland, and believes that these new structures will allow the reinvestment of savings to maintain frontline staff while ensuring that there are improved mechanisms for local democratic accountability and delivery on local priorities." Supported by: Richard Baker*
